remarks: An epimorphism in the opposite category is a monomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oppcmon.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
oppcmon.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
oppcepi.e $e |- E = ( Epi ` O ) $.
oppcepi.m $e |- M = ( Mono ` C ) $.
oppcepi $p |- ( ph -> ( X E Y ) = ( Y M X ) ) $.
